artist: Painter: After Salvator Rosa; Engraver: Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse; Lithographer: Les Langlume
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in image in black: Mauzaisse   Lith de Langlume / 1825 | Below image in black: SALVATOR ROSA, / d'apris son portrait peint pa lui-meme  | on sheet in pencil: 2-319
title: Portrait of Salvator Rosa
